title: Springfield Armory National Historic Site: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do      Springfield Armory National Historic Site offers  Ranger-guided tours, both indoors and (weather permitting) outdoors Self-guided tours of the historic arms collection and industrial machinery Self-guided walking tours of the buildings and grounds Junior Ranger activities for kids Special Events (see our Schedule of Events for upcoming events, and look at our gallery for photos from past events!)  Volunteer In Parks!
